column1: If #COVID19 #coronavirus has your attention, you might want to consider the “health” of the device you might be using to get information. Mobile phones are one of the most germ-laden things we encounter. Learn tips on sanitizing phones here:

Passing thought on the [@HHSGov component] CDC’s gross incompetence and initial denial to test the suspected California “community spread” #COVID19 #coronavirus patient: If you don’t test for, it doesn’t really exist, right? https://twitter.com/copperhead7903/status/1222984127336656917
